name: GoMacro Maple Sea Salt Bar
description:
Packed with 12g of plant-based protein, GoMacro’s Maple Sea Salt bar is a delicious way to speed up your recovery.Organic ingredients: brown rice syrup, sunflower seed butter, pumpkin seeds, protein blend (sprouted brown rice protein, pea protein), crispy brown rice (brown rice, brown rice syrup, sea salt), puffed brown rice, maple syrup, natural flavor, sea salt.Manufactured in a facility that processes peanuts and other nuts.May contain pit or nutshell fragments.

        Sustainability
